briefTitle: A Study of Atezolizumab in Locally Advanced or Metastatic Urothelial or Non-Urothelial Carcinoma of the Urinary Tract
officialTitle: An Open Label, Single Arm, Multicenter, Safety Study of Atezolizumab in Locally Advanced or Metastatic Urothelial or Non-Urothelial Carcinoma of the Urinary Tract
summary: This Phase IIIb, multicenter study will assess the safety of atezolizumab as second- to fourth-line treatment for participants with locally advanced or metastatic urothelial or non-urothelial cancer of the urinary tract in addition to evaluate the efficacy of atezolizumab and potential tumor biomarkers associated with atezolizumab.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline up to end of study (up to approximately 6 years)
